Key Match Events: The Rockets blew an 18-point lead against the Charlotte Hornets
The Rockets had a 20-point route of the Memphis Grizzlies
The Rockets had a failed comeback attempt versus the San Antonio Spurs
Pre-Game Insights: Rockets fans were ready to explode with the excitement of a statement home win against an inferior Charlotte Hornets squad
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets will likely go as far as Jabari Smith and the other role players take them
Jabari Smith needs to consistently fight for rebounds, second chance putbacks, and for the love of all that's sacred, put some arc on your shot and hit an open three-pointer
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jabari Smith might have been the best player on the floor versus the Memphis Grizzlies
This team will likely go as far as Jabari Smith and the other role players take them
Jabari Smith is in his third season and is still very young
Others: The Rockets as a whole need to be more consistent
Rockets fans hope that Jabari Smith's career potential will cap out in Houston, then see it blossom somewhere else
